title: Pad For Workbox, late 18th–early 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, parchment, metal thread
Technique: appliqué
description: Pad covered with blue satin and ornamented with cut parchment stitched with metal thread in design of urn and tomb under palm trees, surrounded by floral border. Lined in white taffeta and edged in satin ribbon, quilled.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pad For Workbox, late 18th–early 19th century.Medium: silk, parchment, metal thread
Technique: appliqué. 1924-15-214.
